pIva#ryasya jAqyA pIvA#naH puqtrA akRu#SAsO asya | 
saqhajA#niqryaH su#maKaqsyamA#naq indrA#yAq&&*Sira(gm)# saqha kuqmByA&dA$t || 
AqSIrmaq Urja#muqta su#prajAqstvamiSha#M dadhAtuq dravi#Naq(gm)q sava#rcasaM | 
saqM jayaqn kShEtrA#Niq saha#sAq&hami#ndra kRuNvAqnO aqnyA(gm) adha#rAnthsaqpatnAn# || 
BUqtama#si BUqtE mA# dhAq muKa#masiq muKa#M BUyAsaqM dyAvA#pRuthiqvIByA$M tvAq pari#gRuhNAmiq viSvE$ tvA dEqvA vai$SvAnaqrAH - [  ]   33
